question:
Sam invests a principal of $10,000, which earns interest over a period of years.
Quantity A
Quantity B
The final value of the investment after 2 years at 8% interest, compounded annually
The final value of the investment after 4 years at 4% interest, compounded annually
A) Quantity A is greater.
B) Quantity B is greater.
C) The two quantities are equal.
D) The relationship cannot be determined from the information given.
